name: Revitalise
description:
Synopsis

Revitalise is a 2D platformer  based in a cursed landscape in which the players  goal is to restore light back the lands, as well as attempting to save his loved ones. The game has its own combat system, enemy AI, platforming and collectible system.

Please note this is only a demo, and the game is still in Pre-Alpha. 

Developers:

- Panikos Theodosiou (Game Designer/Programmer)

- Riona Kraithat (Environmental and Character Artist)

- Chika Robinson (Sound Designer/Composer)

- Hayley Thelwell (Concept Artist)

 Keyboard and Mouse Only
